name: confirm(intent:completion:)
desc: Confirms whether you can change the audio source.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func confirm(intent: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent, 
           completion: @escaping (INSetAudioSourceInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
